review: This is one of the buggies apps I have ever used! Almost every time I use it, there is something I cannot order, or it tells me that it is unavailable. When I get to the store, I find out that it is, and they dont know why I couldn't order it. very frustrating

App itself is fine, 1 star for a few reasons 1. Rewards are the worst out of all the top fast food restaurants, spend $60 to get a free cheeseburger, not worth the effort 2. Mcdonalds as a company is just greed over customer, coupons prices will vary from person to person, we would always use my account when purchasing, we would check my wifes account and her coupons would be better than mine, they assume I will just pay it, POS's
